ModMetaData.name: Stabilized Mechanites
ModMetaData.author: SirVan
ModMetaData.description:
Stabilized mechanites is a small mod adding 2 drugs which are only obtainable via traders or quest rewards, giving you a lesser permanent bonus like the luciferium based on the well known diseases fibrous & sensory mechanites. This is a feature that was intended to be part of a larger project, but that i decided to make as a standalone/light version.
Art by Van, XML by Ythern
